snippet: The United States is keen to include investor protection in a trade pact being negotiated with the European Union and will work with EU officials to find the right balance, a senior U.S. trade official said on Tuesday....

headline.print_headline: U.S. Confident Can Find Balance With EU on Investor Rights
headline.main: U.S. Confident Can Find Balance With EU on Investor Rights

lead_paragraph: The United States is keen to include investor protection in a trade pact being negotiated with the European Union and will work with EU officials to find the right balance, a senior U.S. trade official said on Tuesday.
